title: Full-Text Search Demystified and Awesome Logging Infrastructure Using The Elastic Stack
keywords: elk training, kibana training, elastic search training, elasticsearch training, elastic training, logstash training
metaDescription: Intensive practical class on using ELK stach for building logging and full-text search infrastructure
description: The goal of this intensive, practical course is to equip you with enough knowledge so you can use ELK technologies to build production-ready logging and full-text search infrastructure.
audience: Developers, architects, ops willing to expand their ELK knowledge beyond basics
certification: You earn a certificate of participation by attending the course. No exam required.
language: The course is taught in English.
